title: Adventure Mode
desc: Players that are in Adventure Mode are permanently separated from the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile; they cannot place, break, or stand on <:builder:1119843481700012103> cards. Any <:builder:1119843481700012103> cards, while you are in Adventure Mode, may be played like a <:hyrulean:1119825670864916551> card.
